content.c_venueAddress: Victoria Palace Theatre, 79 Victoria St, London SW1E 5EA
content.name: Hamilton

primaryPhoto.description:
The West End’s Victoria Palace Theatre is currently home to Lin-Manuel Miranda’s critically acclaimed musical, HAMILTON – the story of America then, as told by America now.
Inspired by Ron Chernow’s biography of Alexander Hamilton, HAMILTON has book, music and lyrics by Lin-Manuel Miranda and is directed by Thomas Kail. Choreography is by Andy Blankenbuehler with musical supervision and orchestrations by Alex Lacamoire.
Declan Spaine portrays the title role of Alexander Hamilton alongside Shan Ako (Eliza Hamilton), Ava Brennan (Angelica Schuyler) and Simbi Akande (Peggy Schuyler) as the Schuyler sisters.
HAMILTON is the winner of 11 Tony Awards including Best Musical, 7 Olivier Awards, the 2016 Pulitzer Prize for Drama and the 2016 Grammy Award for Best Musical Theater Album.
Book your HAMILTON theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
